action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: There are colorful blocks in a Tetris-like arrangement. From left to right, there are blocks shaped like:
- A green "I" shape stacked on a purple "T" shape.
- A green "J" shape.
- An orange "L" shape.
- An orange "T" shape.
- A pink "T" shape.
- A pink "I" shape with an additional small square on top right.
continue

From left to right, the colors and shapes of the blocks are as follows: two green vertical blocks, a purple plus-shaped block, two green stair-shaped blocks, an orange L-shaped block, and a pink T-shaped block with a smaller white block on top. Additionally, there is another orange L-shaped block below the left-most green vertical block.
